action.name: Serrated Sword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reaction.name: Shape Theft
reaction.text: After the draconian kills a Medium or smaller Humanoid, the draconian can magically transform itself to look and feel like that creature while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation lasts until the draconian dies or uses an action to end it.

monster.name: Draconian Foot Soldier
monster.speed: walk 30 ft.
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 178

trait.name: Controlled Fall
trait.text: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage.

trait.name: Death Throes
trait.text: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its body turns to stone and releases a petrifying gas. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends; otherwise the creature is petrified for 1 minute. After 1 minute, the body of the draconian crumbles to dust.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The draconian makes two Shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

monster.name: Draconian Infiltrator
monster.speed: walk 40 ft., climb 30 ft.
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 178

trait.name: Death Throes
trait.text: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it turns into a puddle of acid and splashes acid on those around it. Each creature within 5 feet of the draconian must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be covered in acid for 1 minute. A creature can use its action to scrape or wash the acid off itself or another creature. A creature covered in the acid takes 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Glide
trait.text: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The draconian makes two Dagger attacks. If both attacks hit the same creature, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned until the end of the target's next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

monster.name: Draconian Mage
monster.speed: walk 30 ft.
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 179

trait.name: Death Throes
trait.text: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its scales and flesh immediately shrivel away and its bones explode. Each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) force damage.

trait.name: Glide
trait.text: When the draconian falls and isn't incapacitated, it subtracts up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating the fall's damage, and it can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The draconian makes two Trident or Necrotic Ray attacks.

action.name: Trident
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Necrotic Ray
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

action.name: Spellcasting
action.text:
The draconian casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
• 1/Day each: enlarge/reduce, invisibility, stinking cloud

monster.spells: enlarge/reduce, invisibility, stinking cloud

monster.name: Draconian Mastermind
monster.speed: walk 35 ft.
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 180

trait.name: Death Throes
trait.text: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, its magical essence lashes out as a ball of lightning at the closest creature within 30 feet of it before arcing out to up to two other creatures within 15 feet of the first. Each creature must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The draconian makes three Rend or Energy Ray attacks.

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Energy Ray
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) force damage.

action.name: Noxious Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The draconian exhales a 15-foot cone of noxious gas. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) poison damage and gains 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, doesn't gain exhaustion, and is immune to all draconians' Noxious Breath for 24 hours.

action.name: Spellcasting
action.text:
The draconian casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
• At will: invisibility, mage hand • 2/Day each: dimension door, disguise self, sending

reaction.name: Magic Shield (3/Day)
reaction.text: When the draconian is hit by an attack roll, it can create an invisible barrier of magical force around itself, granting it a +5 bonus to its AC against that attack and potentially causing the attack to miss.

monster.spells: invisibility, mage hand, dimension door, disguise self, sending

monster.name: Draconic Shard
monster.speed: walk 0 ft., fly 80 ft. (hover)
monster.resist: acid, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 181

trait.name: Deflection
trait.text: The shard's AC includes its Intelligence modifier.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
trait.text: The shard can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it takes 5 (1d10) force damage.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: If the shard fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
trait.text: When it drops to 0 hit points, the shard disappears and leaves a Tiny cracked gemstone in its space. The gemstone matches the kind of gem dragon it was in life and has AC 20, 15 hit points, and immunity to all damage except force. Unless the gemstone is destroyed, after 1d20 days, the gemstone dissipates and the shard re-forms, regaining all its hit points and appearing in the place the gemstone once occupied or in the nearest unoccupied space.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The shard doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The shard makes two Telekinetic Rend attacks.

action.name: Telekinetic Rend
action.text: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) force damage.

action.name: Inhabit Object
action.text:
The shard disappears as it pours its psychic essence into a Medium or smaller nonsentient object it can see within 30 feet of it, magically possessing it. The object uses the shard's AC, and any damage dealt to the object applies to the shard's hit points. The shard inhabits the object until it uses an action to leave; until it is turned; until it is reduced to 0 hit points; or until an effect that ends possession, such as a dispel evil and good spell, is used on it. When it leaves the object, it reappears in the nearest unoccupied space.
While inhabited, the object becomes a magic item if it wasn't already, and a Tiny cracked gemstone matching the kind of gem dragon the shard was in life appears somewhere on the object. The shard can cause the object to fly using the shard's own flying speed, use its senses, speak verbally or telepathically, cast spells, and use its legendary actions.
If a creature wears or carries the inhabited object, the shard can grant the creature the following benefits:
• Each of the creature's attacks deals an extra 1d8 force damage on a hit.
• The creature gains resistance to psychic damage.

action.name: Psychic Crush (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The shard unleashes a pulse of psychic power. Each creature of the shard's choice in a 60-foot-radius sphere centered on it must make a DC 20 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 55 (10d10) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

action.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
action.text:
The shard casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
• At will: detect thoughts, invisibility, telekinesis

legendary.name: Legendary Actions (3/Turn)
legendary.text: The shard can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The shard regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Rend
legendary.text: The shard makes one Telekinetic Rend attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The shard uses Spellcasting.

legendary.name: Commanding Thought (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The shard targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the end of its next turn. While charmed in this way, the target becomes the shard's puppet, acting and moving in accordance with its telepathic commands. While under the shard's control, the target can take only the Attack (shard chooses the target) or Dash action on its turn.

monster.spells: detect thoughts, invisibility, telekinesis

monster.name: Draconic Spirit
monster.speed: walk 30 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.
monster.resist: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison (Chromatic and Metallic Only), force, necrotic, psychic, radiant, thunder (Gem Only)
monster.languages: draconic, understands the languages you speak
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 21

trait.name: Stats
trait.text:
• Armor Class: 14 + the level of the spell (natural armor)
• Hit Points: 50 + 10 for each spell level above 5th (the dragon has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to the level of the spell)
• Proficiency Bonus: equals your bonus

trait.name: Shared Resistances
trait.text: When you summon the dragon, choose one of its damage resistances. You have resistance to the chosen damage type until the spell ends.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon makes a number of Rend attacks equal to half the spell's level (rounded down), and it uses Breath Weapon.

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 4 + the spell's level piercing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon
action.text: The dragon exhales destructive energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature takes 2d6 damage of a type this dragon has resistance to (your choice) on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Dragon Blessed
monster.speed: walk 30 ft.
monster.languages: Common, Draconic, and any two languages
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 188

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The blessed makes two Mace or Radiant Bolt attacks.

action.name: Mace
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Bolt
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (5d8) radiant damage, and the blessed regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

action.name: Spellcasting
action.text:
The blessed casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
• At will: light, thaumaturgy • 1/Day each: enhance ability, flame strike, mass cure wounds, revivify, tongues

monster.spells: light, thaumaturgy, enhance ability, flame strike, mass cure wounds, revivify, tongues

monster.name: Dragon Chosen
monster.speed: walk 30 ft.
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 189

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The chosen makes one Handaxe attack and two Shortsword attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage. Hit or Miss: The handaxe magically returns to the chosen's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Biting Rebuke
reaction.text: Immediately after the chosen takes damage from a creature within 5 feet of it, it can make a Shortsword attack with advantage against that creature.

monster.name: Dragon Speaker
monster.speed: walk 30 ft.
monster.languages: Common, Draconic, and any two languages
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 189

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The speaker makes two Thunder Bolt attacks.

action.name: Thunder Bolt
action.text: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d8) thunder damage, and the target is pushed horizontally up to 10 feet away from the speaker.

action.name: Spellcasting
action.text:
The speaker casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
• At will: dancing lights • 1/Day each: calm emotions, charm person, command, comprehend languages

reaction.name: Disarming Words (3/Day)
reaction.text: When a creature the speaker can see within 60 feet of it makes a damage roll, the speaker can roll a d6 and subtract the number rolled from that damage roll.

monster.name: Dragon Turtle Wyrmling
monster.speed: walk 20 ft., swim 30 ft.
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 192

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon turtle exhales steam in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.

monster.name: Dragonblood Ooze
monster.speed: walk 20 ft., climb 20 ft.
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, prone, restrained
monster.languages: understands Draconic and the languages of its creator but can't speak
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 182

trait.name: Amorphous
trait.text: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ooze makes two Pseudopod attacks. The ooze can replace one Pseudopod attack with its Slime Breath, if available.

action.name: Pseudopod
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Slime Breath (Recharge 6)
action.text: The ooze expels a spray of its gelatinous mass in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 22 (4d10) acid damage and is pulled up to 30 feet straight toward the ooze. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

monster.name: Dragonbone Golem
monster.speed: walk 40 ft.
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monster.languages: understands Draconic and the languages of its creator but can't speak
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 183

trait.name: Fear Aura
trait.text: Each creature of the golem's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the golem must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw unless the golem is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this golem's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
trait.text: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The golem makes one Pinion attack and two Rend attacks.

action.name: Pinion
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is pinned beneath the bony pinion and restrained. The golem has two pinions, each of which can restrain one target. If a creature is restrained by one of the pinions, the golem can't attack with it. Any creature restrained by a pinion can free itself at the start of its turn with a successful DC 17 Strength (Athletics) check.

action.name: Rend
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

action.name: Petrifying Breath (Recharge 5-6)

Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) poison damage and be restrained as it begins to turn to stone. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends on the target. On a failed save, the target is petrified.

monster.name: Dragonborn of Bahamut
monster.speed: walk 30 ft., fly 30 ft.
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 184

The dragonborn can cause the sword to flare with bright light, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the dragonborn's next turn. The sword can flare in this way only once per turn.

action.name: Healing Touch (1/Day)
action.text: The dragonborn touches another creature within 5 feet of it. The target magically regains 40 hit points. In addition, all diseases and poisons affecting the target are removed.

action.name: Radiant Breath (Recharge 6)
action.text: The dragonborn exhales fiery radiance in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. When the dragonborn uses this action, it can choose up to three creatures in the cone. These creatures take no damage from the radiance and instead regain 22 (4d10) hit points each.

monster.name: Dragonborn of Sardior
monster.speed: walk 30 ft., fly 30 ft. (hover)
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 185

trait.text: If the dragonborn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mental Defense

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Mind Blade
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4+4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

action.name: Heat Breath (Recharge 6)
action.text: The dragonborn exhales a wave of intense heat in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Metal objects in that area glow red-hot until the end of the dragonborn's next turn. Any creature in physical contact with a heated object at the start of its turn must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) fire damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
action.text:
The dragonborn casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks):
• 1/Day each: Bigby's hand, hypnotic pattern, telekinesis

trait.text: If the dragonborn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12+5) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

action.text: The dragonborn exhales shadowy fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Dragonflesh Abomination

monster.languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

trait.name: Regeneration
trait.text: The abomination regains 10 hit points at the start of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Claw

action.name: Acidic Spit

monster.name: Dragonflesh Grafter

monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 186

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage.

monster.immune: determined by the drake's Draconic Essence trait
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 15

monster.name: Egg Hunter Adult
monster.speed: walk 40 ft., climb 40 ft.
monster.description: Source: Fizban's Treasury of Dragons p. 193

trait.name: Amphibious

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: If the egg hunter is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Dragons have disadvantage on this check.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The egg hunter makes two Barbed Proboscis attacks, and it can use Torpor Spores if it's available.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the egg hunter regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.
